text: John Allison Asistio or shortly as Ali Asistio, (born on June 30, 1996) is a Filipino model and indie actor in the Philippines, He is first seen in showbiz industry at the midnight talkshow Walang Tulugan with the Master Showman, along with the co-hosts Sanya Lopez and Ken Chan. ==Career== Asistio is one of the talkshow host in Walang Tulugan with the Master Showman , His started acting career at D'Kilabots Pogi Brothers Weh..., (2012) In 2020 He played the role as Jaime in the television series Win Jaime's Heart (2020), Ramil at Kara Krus (2022) and Orius in Alapaap (2022). ==Filmography== ===Television=== Years Title Role Network 2020 Win Jaime's Heart Jaime --- 2012 Walang Tulugan with the Master Showman Himself GMA Network ===Films=== Years Title Role 2022 Alapaap Orius Kara Krus Ramil 2012 D'Kilabots Pogi Brothers Weh... title: Ali Asistio
